mapper.select: SELECT t1.id AS role_id, t3.id AS resource_id, t3.resource_url, t3.resource_type FROM t_auth_role t1 INNER JOIN t_auth_role_resource t2 ON t1.id = t2.role_id AND t1.del_flg = t2.del_flg INNER JOIN t_auth_resource T3 ON t2.resource_id = t3.id AND t2.del_flg = t3.del_flg WHERE t1.role_enabled =#{roleEnabled} AND t1.del_flg =#{delFlg0} UNION SELECT t1.id as role_id, t3.id as resource_id, t3.resource_url, t3.resource_type FROM t_auth_role t1 CROSS JOIN t_auth_resource t3 WHERE t3.del_flg =#{delFlgR}
SELECT t1.id FROM t_auth_role t1 INNER JOIN t_auth_user_role t2 ON t1.id = t2.role_id AND t1.del_flg = t2.del_flg WHERE t1.role_enabled = #{roleEnabled} AND t1.del_flg = #{delFlg0}
